name: privacy-manager-components
description: Web components for the Privacy Manager

scripts.test: npm run build:puppeteer && (http-server dist -p 3001 & mocha tests/puppeteer/*/*.js)
scripts.build:puppeteer: npm run clean && PPTR=1 webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:smoke: npm run clean && SMOKE=1 webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:smoke:watch: npm run clean && SMOKE=1 WATCH=1 webpack --config webpack.config.js

author: Manvel Saroyan
